title: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With...' followed by 'Default Text Editor', nothing happens. Instead, the scripted resource editor example is reactivated.
EB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With...' followed by 'Default Text Editor', a new editor window should open displaying the content of the file, regardless of whether the file is already open in a different type of editor.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. The editor used for 'test.xml' should be the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
5. Choose 'Open With...' followed by 'Default Text Editor'.
6. Confirm that a new editor window opens displaying the content of 'test.xml', instead of reactivating the scripted resource editor example.
